metadata.synopsis: This AD plays after you have spoken with the ox with SwA, if you linger or pass by the ox again.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to WLD_Main_A2. Go to Druid's Grove, at the tiefling cave3. Speak with the strange ox4. When dialog with the ox ends, this AD plays on the ox if you linger or pass by the ox again
